original_text:
Surely I was sinful at birth,
    sinful from the time my mother conceived me.
korean_text: 내가 죄악 중에서 출생하였음이여 어머니가 죄 중에서 나를 잉태하였나이다

sentences.original_text: Surely I was sinful at birth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 비로소 태어날 때에 죄악 중에 잉태하였나이다

sentences.original_text: sinful from the time my mother conceived me
sentences.korean_translation: 어머니가 나를 잉태할 때에도 죄악 중에 있었나이다
